Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.junit

Class AbstractCompilersProvider

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.junit.AbstractCompilersProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArgumentsProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavacCompilerTest.JavacCompilersProvider
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public abstract class AbstractCompilersProvider extends Object implements ArgumentsProvider
Base for defining a compiler-supplying arguments provider for Junit Jupiter parameterised test support.
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

    • configure

      protected final void configure(int min, int max, boolean modules, Class<? extends JctCompilerConfigurer.JctSimpleCompilerConfigurer>[] configurerClasses)
      Configure this provider with parameters from annotations.
      Parameters:
      min - the inclusive minimum compiler version to use.
      max - the inclusive maximum compiler version to use.
      modules - whether the compiler version must support modules.
      configurerClasses - the configurer classes to apply to each compiler.
